organization.description:
The mission of IPN is to ensure public health and safety by providing an avenue for swift intervention/close monitoring and advocacy of nurses whose practice may be impaired due to the use, misuse, or abuse of alcohol or drugs, or a mental and/or physical condition. IPN is authorized by Florida Statute, Chapter 464/456, to assist those nurses whose practice is affected.

Services provided include:

* Confidential consultations 
* Evaluate incoming referrals 
* Provide intervention training 
* Conduct state-wide training sessions 
* Facilitate evaluations and/or treatment 
* Provide on-going advocacy for participants 
* Nurse Support Groups 
* Detect relapses and provide a format for early intervention 
* Report non-compliance of participants to DOH for appropriate action to ensure public safety and welfare
* Case management 

###COL###
###MON###
organization.name: INTERVENTION PROJECT FOR NURSES, INC.
